Sentencas: La0.8Sr0.2Mn1-xScxO3-delta(abbreviated as LSMSx, x = 0, 0.02, 0.05, and 0.1) samples were prepared using a modified Pechini method.
Titulo: Scandium-Doped La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathode Materials for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD) and temperature-programmed reduction (H-2-TPR) were carried out to characterize the structure and the reduction behavior of the LSMSx samples.
Titulo: Scandium-Doped La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathode Materials for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Electrochemical evaluation was employed to assess the performance of intemiediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) using LSMSx-based cathode.
Titulo: Scandium-Doped La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathode Materials for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: XRD analysis indicated that the pure perovskite structure could only be obtained at the sintering temperature of 900 degrees C and lower Sc doping concentration (x < 0.1).
Titulo: Scandium-Doped La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathode Materials for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: As the increase of sintering temperature and Sc doping concentration, the Sc2O3 secondary phase tended to segregate from the perovskite structure.
Titulo: Scandium-Doped La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathode Materials for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The H-2-TPR profiles of LSMSx samples were greatly affected by the sintering temperature.
Titulo: Scandium-Doped La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathode Materials for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The substitution-induced improvement in reducibility for LSMS samples was detected, which might be ascribed to the increases of Mn4+ and oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Scandium-Doped La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathode Materials for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: It can also be found that the increase of Sc2O3 Separation possibly brought adverse effect to the reducibility of LSMS samples.
Titulo: Scandium-Doped La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathode Materials for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Electrochemical evaluation results showed that the performance of the cells with different cathodes was affected by the Sc doping concentration, operation temperature, as well as the cathode sintering temperature.
Titulo: Scandium-Doped La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathode Materials for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In the range of Sc doping concentration studied, LSMS-based cathode materials showed higher lower-temperature performance than Sc free LSM-based materials.
Titulo: Scandium-Doped La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathode Materials for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This is primarily due to the increase of substitution-induced oxygen vacancies, which improved the electrochemical activity towards oxygen reduction for LSM-based cathode materials.
Titulo: Scandium-Doped La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathode Materials for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
